com.danielly.jsf.cinema.dao

Class SearchDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.danielly.jsf.cinema.dao.SearchDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SearchDao

    @ApplicationScoped
public class SearchDaoImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements SearchDao
    The class SearchDaoImpl contains all the methods implementation to query the database for the search component. In addition, stores lists that will be used for selections by the user. This class implements the SearchDao interface
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Gil Danielly
